projectlist.title: VIKINGS ULTIMATE REALITY EXPERIENCE
projectlist.header_text: A 3D experience brings the Vikings cast to life.

detail.title: VIKINGS ULTIMATE REALITY EXPERIENCE
detail.description: The audience gets a 3D look at the Vikings cast of characters. Built to complement the mobile app, users can view 3d rotations of the characters and view videos that reveal more about the characters.

projectlist.title: At The Heart of Otis
projectlist.client: otis college of art and design, pprwrkstudio
projectlist.header_text: Students share their college experiences on social media

detail.title: At The Heart of Otis
detail.description: An interactive call to raise funds for the school. Users could share their stories about the faculty and their school experience. Concepted and executed in collaboaration with pprwrk studio
